languages.text: "Я думала, это просто мутации... Вы хотите сказать... Нас обманули нелюди?! Богохульные нелюди?! Святой Трон, что же мы наделали..."
"I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."
languages.original_text: "Я думала, это просто мутации... Вы хотите сказать... Нас обманули нелюди?! Богохульные нелюди?! Святой Трон, что же мы наделали..."

traits.locale_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you telling me that… We have been tricked by xenos? The real xenos?! By Holy Throne, what have we done..."
"I thought they were just mutations. Are you telling me that… We have been tricked by xenos? The real xenos?! By Holy Throne, what have we done..."
"I thought they were just mutations. Are you telling me that… we have been tricked by xenos? The real xenos? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."
"I thought they were just mutations. Are you telling me that… we have been tricked by xenos? The real xenos? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."
"I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."
"I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."

languages.text: «Pensé que solo eran mutaciones. ¿Quieres...? ¿Quiere decir que nos han engañado monstruos inhumanos? Por el Trono Sagrado, ¿qué hemos hecho?...».
languages.original_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."

traits.locale_text: «Pensé que solo eran mutaciones. ¿Quieres...? ¿Quiere decir que nos han engañado monstruos inhumanos? Por el Trono Sagrado, ¿qué hemos hecho?...».

languages.text: 「ただの突然変異だと思っていたわ。つまり…私たちは人間ではない悪魔に騙されたというの？聖なる王座よ、私たちは一体何を…」
languages.original_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."

traits.locale_text: 「ただの突然変異だと思っていたわ。つまり…私たちは人間ではない悪魔に騙されたというの？聖なる王座よ、私たちは一体何を…」

languages.text: “我以为那只是变异而已，您的意思是说……我们被异形恶魔骗了？神圣的黄金王座在上啊，我们到底做了什么啊……”
languages.original_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."

traits.locale_text: “我以为那只是变异而已，您的意思是说……我们被异形恶魔骗了？神圣的黄金王座在上啊，我们到底做了什么啊……”

languages.text: "Ich dachte, sie wären nur Mutationen. Wollt Ihr sagen ... wir wurden von unmenschlichen Unholden hereingelegt? Beim Heiligen Thron, was haben wir getan ..."
languages.original_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich dachte, sie wären nur Mutationen. Wollt Ihr sagen ... wir wurden von unmenschlichen Unholden hereingelegt? Beim Heiligen Thron, was haben wir getan ..."

languages.text: « Je croyais que ce n'était que des mutations. Vous dites... qu'on a été trompés par des monstres non-humains ? Par le saint Trône, qu'est-ce qu'on a fait... »
languages.original_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."

traits.locale_text: « Je croyais que ce n'était que des mutations. Vous dites... qu'on a été trompés par des monstres non-humains ? Par le saint Trône, qu'est-ce qu'on a fait... »

languages.text: "Mutasyondan ibaret sanıyordum. Yoksa... İnsan dışı canavarların oyununa mı geldik? Yüce Taht aşkına, ne yaptık biz..."
languages.original_text: "I thought they were just mutations. Are you saying... we've been tricked by inhuman fiends? By the Holy Throne, what have we done..."
